title: Not worth the time
body: This game is literally not worth playing considering it only lets me download it for install at around 1.2 mbps and my actually speed to the area is around 28 mbps. Literally any game has better download rates and install times. Not to mention its a ridiculously long download for a game with a terrible community I've been here since season 1 and have a few hundreds of dollars into the game and still think its not even slightly worth playing because of the ridiculous download speed
